resources.string: Displays information about the device\'s remaining battery and charging state.
The battery should be fully charged in approximately %s
Calculating the amount of time until the battery is fully charged
The battery should be totally drained in approximately %s
Calculating the amount of time until the battery is totally drained
Your battery is at full capacity
Your battery in totally charged. You may unplug the device.
Your battery doesn\'t seem to be charging
Your battery isn\'t charging properly. Try charging via an AC power source to see if that resolves the issue
Your battery status could not be determined
Unable to check battery status. Try rebooting your device to see if that resolves the issue.
